extendedInfo.description: With the Craftsman Tools and DIY App, Craftsman Club members can stay up-to-date on the latest Club Saver Days deals and innovative product launches and access exclusive Club content. Non-members can use the app to join Craftsman Club, receive additional product information and view monthly Club deals. Club deals are only available to members and are reflected in the cart during checkout.  With the Craftsman app, users can:Stay Current On Club DealsView the exclusive member deals on items across all categories available each month during Club Savers Days.  Access Exclusive Programs Watch and listen to exclusive Craftsman World of DIY audio podcasts and video project sessions from the Craftsman Experience studios and elsewhere. Use the Product Demo Tool Roll over hotspots to learn more about the features of the latest Craftsman innovations. View Projects Of The Month  Preview the most recent Club Project of the Month and see archived projects with the option of having a step-by-step PDF sent to your email address. Find Where To Buy Find the store nearest you through a Zip Code search or current location geo-targeting.  Connect Through Social Media Share content via Facebook and links to your wish list. Learn More With The QR Code Scanner Scan any Craftsman QR code in a store on a product package or in a Craftsman circular by taking a picture to be directed to information about special promotions, product content and comparisons.

reviews.title: Samsung GS3
reviews.comment: Hasn\'t worked on my last two phones. Back button closes app. Format doesn\'t fit at all. Unable to even see products or open categories 90% of the time. Please fix this. I would use this app all the time.
reviews.author: Robin D.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: My husband, kids and I built a couple of toy boxes and the rolling bar for our home and now our kids are getting on here to find the next project for us to do. We absolutely love it!
reviews.author: Veronica Cunningham

reviews.title: Annoying...
reviews.comment: Installed. Tried a product search. Search worked but sorting the results didn\'t. I viewed an item and the clicked the back button to return to the list and it closed the app. Uninstalled. HTC EVO 4G
reviews.author: Dave Radabaugh

reviews.title: Very frustrating!
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t show all the parts from the website. Shows the same part 3 times. Keeps going back to page one.
reviews.author: Bob Crow

reviews.title: Has potential to at least work correctly...
reviews.comment: Navigation is impossible and frustrating.   Especially when you get back into the app and click details and see a product description from something you looked at days prior.
reviews.author: Justin Nieves

reviews.title: Sears IT
reviews.comment: Certainly not a Craftsman quality app.  Worse than the mobile website it links to.  Please fix for all us Craftsman fans.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs Help !!!!!!
reviews.comment: Can be a great app if all the bugs were fixed. You press the back button on phone and it completely exits you out of the app. You can not find the shopping list you created anywhere on this app. And when you click on more options for a category you are searching in, it will load something completely different up. Needs fixing or needs to be deleted.
reviews.author: Phillip Connor

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: Thumbnails are just that, thumbnails. No larger photo. Back button exits app. It\'s tough to accomplish what you are trying to do but keep at it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok shopping app
reviews.comment: Ok app but needs some upgrades and bug fixes. No force close issues but back button closes the app and having issues with the view of products. And if you rotate phone than app returns to its homepage.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Has Potential
reviews.comment: App has potential but needs work like the ability to sign in to Craftsman Club withing the app and a way to go back.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect App
reviews.comment: Love this app. All works well. Perfect for a crazed Craftsman fan like myself.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poorly designed.
reviews.comment: Poor routing, pages won\'t change, back button ends the app.  needs major updating
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: GS4 - app looks nice, but functions poorly. Its just a reskinned version of their mobile website, with half the function. Back button closes the app, and there is no home button in app.
reviews.author: Adam Graham

reviews.title: Does Sears know this app is bad.
reviews.comment: This is crap. I do a search for a nailer that goes \"okay\" then search for a table saw. I pulled up the specs for the saw and it\'s the specs to the nailer. This thing needs some work. When you try to go back to previous screen it just kicks you out of the app all together. I love Sears but not this app.
reviews.author: Tony Shafer

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: Hard to navigate and filters should be updated to allow segregation between grouped products. Spent 20 min looking for a 3/8\" impact but finally gave up.
reviews.author: Walter Keen

reviews.title: Wish I didnt have to give it one star
reviews.comment: Its impossible to shop on this app the navigation is crap. If this is how there tools are going to hold up ill take my business elsewhere
reviews.author: Lucas Carmack

reviews.title: Good but needs work.
reviews.comment: I like the app but it needs work. The navigation is crude and by that I mean when use the back button rather than returning to the previous page it simply exits the app all together. When trying load more results in any category it will load a completely different category for example. When I was looking for a socket I had hit the \"loas more\" button at rhe bottom of the screen and it actually loaded the specialty tools category I had been in about 15 minutes before.
reviews.author: michael hammer

reviews.title: Not user friendly
reviews.comment: Signs you out when you use back to go back to list
reviews.author: Steve Bowman

reviews.title: Needs lots of work
reviews.comment: First, this is no indication of how I feel about Sears or Craftsman tools. Just this app. It needs serious work. Every time I hit the back button, it logs me out and I have to reenter my password and username. Half of the time when I go to look at certain items, the page doesn\'t load. Then, when it does load, it  will crash, again, about half the time. Please fix these problems.
reviews.author: Matt Ezell

reviews.title: No good
reviews.comment: Continues to sign me out. Also tried to buy a product got all the way to checkout and it kicked me out. Now I will not buy
reviews.author: A Google User
